data.name: Warface - Christmas Pack
data.detailed_description:
Embrace the spirit of Christmas with a themed pack capable of turning you into killer frost. Don’t be fooled by the merry appearance of these items – they pack quite a punch. Unique looking weapons will enable you to dispose of your foes in mercilessly festive style, while you unlock Christmas achievements.

This pack includes:
  • Permanent Christmas LMG240
  • Permanent Christmas Striker
  • Permanent Christmas GU1
  • Permanent Christmas Everest
  • Permanent Christmas MD9

  • Icicle Knife for 30 days
  • Christmas Firecracker for 30 days
  • Christmas Grenade x 50
  • Christmas Gift Box x 50

  • Christmas Rifleman Helmet for 30 days
  • Christmas Medic Helmet for 30 days
  • Christmas Engineer Helmet for 30 days
  • Christmas Sniper Helmet for 30 days
  • Christmas Vest for 30 days
  • Christmas Gloves for 30 days
  • Christmas Boots for 30 days

Primary and secondary weapons:
No rifle is quite as present-full as Christmas LMG240. Excellent damage, impressive range and large clip size are but a few perks of this gun. Alternatively, administer a sweeping dose of festive treatment with Christmas Striker. You can count on its high RPM and fast reloading. Christmas lights will be the brightest with GU1 thanks to its low recoil and customization options. And killing foes with Christmas Everest is like taking candy from a baby – it even looks like the former. With wild damage and range the enemies are not likely to survive the first encounter with you. But in case you need to finish them off – MD9 will be there for you. With its superb aim and hip accuracy no one will touch your presents.

Other weapons:
Unleash your killer frost instincts when you stab your enemies with an icicle. Watch as the bodies hit the floor swarmed by the confetti from Christmas firecrackers or treat yourself to some lightshows with Christmas grenades. Meanwhile, Gift Boxes make explosively pleasant presents for all who oppose you.

Equipment:
Dress up as a rampaging Santa! Enjoy increased armor points and ammo capacity, protection against explosives and damage reduction with a Christmas vest. Speed up your reloading and weapon switching with themed gloves, while your boots boost your sprint. Stay frosty with distinctive Christmas helmets unique in appearance for each class. Each of them offers increased head protection and decreased flashbang effect.

Winter has arrived!

data.short_description: Embrace the spirit of Christmas with a themed pack capable of turning you into killer frost. Don’t be fooled by the merry appearance of these items – they pack quite a punch. Unique looking weapons will enable you to dispose of your foes in mercilessly festive style, while you unlock Christmas achievements.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
